effect.scarlet_violet: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.the_teal_mask: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.the_indigo_disk: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.legends_za: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.legends_za: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.
